data.text:
Coming home or heading to your next adventure? Either way, it's never a bad time to start planning your next one!
From last minute flights to planning vacations, you can count on Flair to fly you further for less. Visit https://t.co/5vddsNzFNu for all of the lowest fares. https://t.co/9AYQ2PyJBk

urls.title: Flair Airlines - Best prices on flights in Canada
urls.description: Flair Airlines is here to change the way Canadians travel. Learn more about Flair Airlines, our low fares across Canada, and book your flights!

data.text:
Just a typical day in the office from above the clouds. Working a weekend doesn't seem that bad now, does it?
Flair is growing and currently has pilot positions open in Vancouver and Toronto. Join Canada's only true ULCC and apply today: https://t.co/JF1LUg1AIP https://t.co/g2E3QgHhk1

Spend less time stuck on the 405 and more time strolling along Rodeo Drive – Burbank is a better way to see LA!
Oh and #ICYMI, It's the LAST DAY to get 100% off base fare on all Hollywood-Burbank flights using code: laforfree https://t.co/ZfsCptz49U #BUR @fly_BUR https://t.co/ksuXnZ8Lu5

100%-off base fare!
Only pay taxes and fees on flights to BUR! Limited seats
Blackout dates: https://t.co/3VcVaP5eUV

100% de remise sur les tarifs de base!
Ne payez que les taxes et les frais sur les vols vers BUR! Places limitées
Dates d'interdiction: https://t.co/tKyQH5m2Bp https://t.co/wII7gU8dC2

data.text: Aujourd'hui, c'est le premier #JNVR. Portez 🧡 pour réfléchir à l'héritage des pensionnats, honorer les survivants et à la mémoire de ceux qui ne sont jamais rentrés chez eux. Apprendre, désapprendre et écouter, aujourd'hui et tous les jours. #ChaqueEnfantCompte https://t.co/myfmCbkjDy

Today is the first #NDTR. Wear 🧡 to reflect on the legacy of residential schools, honour survivors, and in memory of those who never made it home. Learn, unlearn, and listen today and everyday, so we can be better allies on this journey towards reconciliation. #EveryChildMatters https://t.co/NjtlXatDo6

urls.description: Albertans will be paid $100 to get a first or second dose of vaccine against COVID-19, Premier Jason Kenney announced Friday.
